attributes.action: Scrap id cards as they are an attack on personal liberty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To have prime minister remove the disgrace that is id cards. We are now living in an orwellian society the government has no right to force the population to adhere to this scheme.We regard this as a violation of rights. If id cards are intorduced the undersigned will destroy them.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/No-IDs-more-PCs/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
